description: Chilli and garlic add a mouthwatering aroma to this irresistible chicken stir-fry recipe. Jasmine rice and coriander make this dish even more fragrant.
name: Fast Chilli & Garlic Chicken StirFry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g Birds Eye Stir Fry Mix Chinese
250ml Campbellâ€™s Flavour Boost chilli, garlic & onion

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat. Stirfry chicken, in 2 batches, for 4 minutes or until browned.
Return all chicken to pan with stirfry mix and flavour boost. Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 minutes or until vegetables are tender and sauce has reduced slightly.
Meanwhile, heat rice according to packet instructions.
Divide rice among bowls. Spoon over chicken mixture. Serve topped with coriander.
